meanings.definition: Not forming or based on judgments
meanings.sent1: She always tries to be nonjudgmental when listening to others.
meanings.sent2: Being nonjudgmental allows us to understand different perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The nonjudgmental cat observed the chaos in the room with calm eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her nonjudgmental attitude was like a soothing balm in the heated argument.
meanings.sent5: The nonjudgmental sky embraced all the colors of the sunset without bias.

meanings.sent1: A nonjudgmental approach helps in creating a welcoming environment.
meanings.sent2: It is important to remain nonjudgmental when dealing with sensitive topics.
meanings.sent3: The nonjudgmental mirror reflected back only the truth, without distortion.
meanings.sent4: Her nonjudgmental smile was a beacon of warmth in the cold room.
meanings.sent5: The nonjudgmental river flowed freely, accepting all that came its way.

meanings.sent1: Their nonjudgmental behavior towards newcomers was appreciated by all.
meanings.sent2: A nonjudgmental attitude fosters a sense of belonging in a community.
meanings.sent3: The nonjudgmental tree welcomed all birds to its branches, regardless of size.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of criticism, her nonjudgmental nature stood out like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The nonjudgmental garden flourished with diverse flowers of all shapes and colors.
